text:
[Verse]
Sunset skies they glow so bright
Colors fade into the night
Wish upon a falling star
Dreamin' big no matter how far

[Verse 2]
City lights they start to shine
Moments pass like sips of wine
Chasing dreams we never know
Where they'll lead or how they'll grow

[Chorus]
Sunset dreams in the sky
Magic fills as time goes by
Close your eyes make a wish
Reachin' out for happiness

[Verse 3]
Whispers in the cool night air
Promises we chose to share
Holding hands we walk the shore
Lost in dreams we both adore

[Bridge]
Heartbeats echo with the waves
Memories that time engraves
Sunsets fade but dreams survive
In our hearts they stay alive

[Chorus]
Sunset dreams in the sky
Magic fills as time goes by
Close your eyes make a wish
Reachin' out for happiness
title: Sunset Dreams
